title: Connectivity issues - High Ping
body:
Hi,

I been struggling the past few weeks with very high ping during ranked games.

The problem is i play 3-5 games with my normal ping "60-75" and suddenly when i start a new game and get to the loading screen i get 900+ ping even though i have fiber optic of 50 MB

I ran all kind of troubleshooting in https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I flushed the DNS maybe 100+  

I updated all my drivers, changed the internet cable, contacted my IPS provider and everything was just fine.

What's weird is immediately after one of those games where i had 900+ my ping goes back to "60-75" for  2-3 more games 

I really appreciate your support because im tired of getting "leavebuster" on my screen everyday

replies.body:
It seems like your network is having a hard time keeping a stable connection to our game servers some weird reason. Your ISP might be sending your connection through a route that isn't quite optimal. 

It'd be best for us to be able to help you get this straightened out in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Reach out to us there, and our tech guys will be able to help soon!
